full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BYANG CHUB LAM GYI SGRON MA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,BYANG CHUB LAM GYI SGRON MA SLOB DPON CHEN PO DPAL MAR ME MDZAD YE SHES KYIS MDZAD PA RDZOGS SO, ,@006B (RGYA GAR GYI MKHAN PO D'I PAm K'A RA SHR'I DZNY'A NA DANG, BOD KYI LO TZTSA BA DGE SLONG DGE BA'I BLO GROS KYIS BSGYUR CING ZHUS TE GTAN LA PHAB PA'O,, ,,)
author_simple: DPAL MAR ME MDZAD YE SHES,
